channel.title: Hardware on Franziskus Domig
channel.description: Recent content in Hardware on Franziskus Domig

item.title: My computers
item.description: So there are a couple of computers idling around here. I all of them gave names of planets and have come to the point where I have to use names of stars because I ran out of planets. Here I have a list of all the devices that I am using on a more or less regular basis. I left out smartphones, server in data centers or not anymore working computers at home.
